Reviews.Title: AWEFUL quality and all around.
Reviews.Author: L.C
Reviews.Content: Doesn't even deserve a star at all! Terrible quality pictures! and screen is so small can't see what you'r doing...one camera I bought for my daughter gives only black and white and the other for my son is in color! the software is aweful for 5 dollars i'd keep it for for 20 no way. Better stufff on the market right now! please do not buy! you'll be disappointed all the way!

Reviews.Title: Pictures?  Wish I could see them!
Reviews.Author: New Horizons
Reviews.Content: Definitely not worth $5...I agree with this previous review that it doesn't even deserve one star!  I purchased this camera for my daughter's first summer camp.  She took several pictures at camp...the counter on the camera indicates that.  Of course, when we tried to download the pictures, we couldn't get the camera to download them so lost all the pictures from her first camp.  Fortunately, we only paid $5 for the camera, but that $5 would have been better dropped on the ground.  At least then it would have put a smile on someone's face!  :)
